name: Idea
description: Represents an idea posted to the Ideas application.
summary:
The `Idea` object in Salesforce has the following attributes:

1. **Id** (Type: id)
2. **IsDeleted** (Type: boolean)
3. **Title** (Type: string)
4. **RecordTypeId** (Type: reference)
5. **CreatedDate** (Type: datetime)
6. **CreatedById** (Type: reference)
7. **LastModifiedDate** (Type: datetime)
8. **LastModifiedById** (Type: reference)
9. **SystemModstamp** (Type: datetime)
10. **LastViewedDate** (Type: datetime)
11. **LastReferencedDate** (Type: datetime)
12. **CommunityId** (Type: reference)
13. **Body** (Type: textarea)
14. **NumComments** (Type: int)
15. **VoteScore** (Type: double)
16. **VoteTotal** (Type: double)
17. **Categories** (Type: multipicklist)
18. **Status** (Type: picklist)
19. **LastCommentDate** (Type: datetime)
20. **LastCommentId** (Type: reference)
21. **ParentIdeaId** (Type: reference)
22. **IsHtml** (Type: boolean)
23. **IsMerged** (Type: boolean)
24. **CreatorFullPhotoUrl** (Type: string)
25. **CreatorSmallPhotoUrl** (Type: string)
26. **CreatorName** (Type: string)

These attributes include identifiers, timestamps, references to other records, text fields, numerical fields, and boolean flags, which collectively describe the details and status of an idea within the Salesforce application.
label: Idea
